faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have questions? We have answers! Explore our FAQ section to learn more about our web design process, services, and how we can bring your vision to life.

questions.pricingAnswer: Our project prices vary depending on complexity, duration and requirements. We have packages starting from 5,000₺ for basic websites. More detailed pricing is made for e-commerce sites and custom applications. You can contact us to prepare a special offer for you.
questions.extraHours: What happens if I need more hours?
questions.extraHoursAnswer: If additional requirements arise during the project process, we take a flexible approach. A separate pricing is made for additional development hours and work continues after agreement with our client. Customer satisfaction is our priority.
questions.maintenanceAnswer: Yes, we have monthly maintenance packages for the regular maintenance of your projects. These packages include security updates, performance optimizations, content updates and technical support.
questions.documentation: Do you provide documentation for the system?
questions.documentationAnswer: Absolutely! After delivering your project, we prepare documentation on how to manage your website or application.
questions.additionalFeatures: Can I request additional features later?
questions.additionalFeaturesAnswer: Of course! We can add new features even after your project is completed. We develop new features in a scalable way without breaking the existing infrastructure. A separate offer is prepared for each additional feature and discussed with our client.

mindConnect.title: MindConnect - Mental Health and Personal Development Platform
mindConnect.description: A secure, accessible and effective communication platform between people seeking psychological support and professional psychologists.
mindConnect.longDescription: "MindConnect" is a comprehensive mobile application that provides supportive services in the field of mental health and personal development. The application creates a secure, accessible and effective communication platform between people seeking psychological support and professional psychologists. Users' mental health status is evaluated with the Kessler psychological assessment test and personalized recommendations are provided. It helps users achieve meaningful development in their personal development processes with real-time messaging, secure payment system (İyzico), appointment management and comprehensive psychologist evaluation system.

spiroble.title: Spiroble - Respiratory Health Tracking Application
spiroble.description: Mobile application that measures and analyzes respiratory health with spirometer device.
spiroble.longDescription: Spiroble is a mobile application designed to measure and analyze respiratory health. Working integrated with the spirometer device, it provides users with detailed data about lung capacity, breathing patterns and other important metrics. The application helps monitor and improve respiratory performance. It offers user-friendly interface, seamless integration with devices and personalized health management insights.

conversign.title: Conversign - Sign Language AI Translator
conversign.description: Mobile application that converts sign language to speech in real-time with artificial intelligence.
conversign.longDescription: Conversign is a revolutionary application that facilitates communication for hearing-impaired individuals. It recognizes sign language in real-time with advanced artificial intelligence algorithms and converts it to speech. It offers an accessible communication platform by combining computer vision, machine learning and natural language processing technologies.

haberapron.title: HaberApron - Aviation News Platform
haberapron.description: Modern, fast and reliable aviation-focused news platform. Professional web application developed with React + TypeScript + Node.js + PostgreSQL technology stack.
haberapron.longDescription: HaberApron is a modern news platform focused on the aviation industry. It has a frontend developed with React 18 + TypeScript + Vite, a backend powered by Node.js + Express + TypeScript, and a database infrastructure managed with PostgreSQL + Prisma ORM. It is a fully professional web application with Redis cache system, Docker containerization, Nginx web server and GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline. It includes modern web features such as mobile-first responsive design, WebP/AVIF image optimization, advanced search system, comment system and newsletter subscription. The platform presents aviation news to users by categorizing them and provides content management with admin panel.

webDevelopment.title: Web Application Development
webDevelopment.subtitle: Modern, fast and user-friendly web applications
webDevelopment.description: Our web application development process offers a comprehensive approach from understanding customer needs to delivery and maintenance phase.

processSteps.title: Initial Meeting
processSteps.description: Before starting the project, we conduct a detailed meeting to understand the customer's needs, expectations and goals. This stage forms the foundation for proper project planning.

processSteps.title: Requirements Analysis
processSteps.description: Based on the information obtained in the meeting, the business and technical requirements of the project are extracted. Which features are prioritized, user flows and technical requirements are determined in detail.

processSteps.title: Weekly Meetings and Process Tracking
processSteps.description: After agreement with the customer, the project process is closely followed with weekly meetings. At this stage, the project progress is regularly reviewed and necessary revisions are made according to the agreed criteria.
processSteps.note: Note: If new features are added during the process, re-pricing is done for additional work.

processSteps.title: Revisions and Application Delivery
processSteps.description: After the revisions are completed, the application is completed according to the agreed criteria and delivered to the customer. This stage ensures that the project takes its final form with the targeted quality and functionality.

processSteps.title: Maintenance and Support
processSteps.description: Maintenance and support services offered after the delivery of the application cover the smooth operation of the system and updates when necessary. These services are also charged separately.

mobileDevelopment.title: Mobile Application Development
mobileDevelopment.subtitle: Cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android
mobileDevelopment.description: Our mobile application development process offers a comprehensive approach from platform selection to delivery and maintenance phase.

processSteps.title: Platform Selection and Planning
processSteps.description: The most suitable platform (Flutter, React Native) is selected according to the project requirements and a detailed development plan is created.

processSteps.title: UI/UX Design
processSteps.description: Modern and user-friendly interface design is implemented with user experience in the foreground.

processSteps.title: Development and Testing
processSteps.description: The application is developed with the selected technology and comprehensive testing processes are applied.

processSteps.title: App Store Publishing
processSteps.description: The application is published on App Store and Google Play Store and necessary certificates are obtained.

processSteps.title: Maintenance and Updates
processSteps.description: Continuous updating of the application and performance optimization is ensured.
